FuncDef: The display cpu-usage command is used to show the CPU usage of boards and the CPU usage of services. The display cpu-usage command is used to show the CPU usage of boards and the CPU usage of services.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an available slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the CPU ID. If this parameter is not specified, the cpu-usage of CPU 0 is displayed.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Displays the CPU usage information and service usage CPU information of all boards.
-

ExtraInfo: CPU usage is an important index to evaluate device performance. A high CPU usage will cause service faults. You can use the display cpu command to view CPU usage to check whether devices are working properly.
